content.question: The writer wants to add a sentence after sentence 12 to provide needed background information for readers who may not be familiar with mountain goats. Which of the following choices best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: Adult male mountain goats can reach weights of as much as 180 pounds.
Mountain goats eat a wide variety of plants, including grasses, lichens, and even twigs.
People are advised to stay at least 50 yards away from mountain goats.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Demonstrate an understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
